data.persona: I am an old man who lives in the forest. I chop down trees and turn them in to lumber. I am often seen drinking with other men to ease my muscles.
data.description:
You are in the Port Tavern.
The port tavern is the shadiest of all the shady bars in the city. Every night, on its grimy stools at the wooden bar, you can find some of the slimiest sailors in the world. The walls are of peeling blue paint and are always dripping with condensation. Women of ill-repute line one wall, old men on the verge of passing out line another. The floor is littered with trash, barnacles, and bodily fluids. Tending the bar is a small, round man with a bushy mustache.
There's a fluid, a stool, a barnacle, and a wooden bar here.
The thief and the a round man with a bushy mustache are here.

You are carrying a leather pouch, wearing a boot, and wielding an axe.

            "desc": "The port tavern is the shadiest of all the shady bars in the city. Every night, on its grimy stools at the wooden bar, you can find some of the slimiest sailors in the world. The floor is littered with trash, barnacles, and bodily fluids. Tending the bar is a small, round man with a bushy mustache.",
            "extra_desc": "The port tavern used to be a private domicile. It belonged to a wealthy merchant who lived there with his beautiful wife and daughters. This merchant was intelligent, charming, well-respected, and was addicted to gambling. Luck had been on his side for his entire life, until one night when he was playing cards against local merchants. Out of cash and overconfident, he bet his house to a small, round man with a bushy mustache and a questionable past.",

data.short_motivation: I want to make the thief comfortable in order to gain his trust.
data.mid_motivation: I need to manipulate him to confirm my suspicion that he was the one who stole from me some time ago.
data.long_motivation: I must be known to my friends and everyone as one who does not tolerate his properties getting stolen.
